pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Josh Tomlin; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .195 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .301 off him after that.
Josh Tomlin had Miguel Cabrera down 0-2 but could not put him away.

pitch.cc: Josh Tomlin really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .278 average against it this season and Tigers hitters are 0-for-5 against it in this game.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Max Scherzer; Michael Brantley is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .774 OPS against them this season and .713 against everything else.
Max Scherzer is still attacking Michael Brantley with the four-seam fastball even though Brantley hit one for a double last time up.

pitch.cc: Max Scherzer has thrown 86 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 95 over the past 10 pitches.
Max Scherzer is really trying to keep Shin-Soo Choo close; he is 11-for-16 in stolen base attempts this season.
